nodes.text: Corellian Engineering Corporation Research, Development and Engineering Center
The Corellian Engineering Corporation Research, Development and Engineering Center was a scientific organization working for the Corellian Engineering Corporation.

It worked on Corellian starship designs and improved on existing ones, including the YT-1300 light freighter Millennium Falcon. It also occasionally worked with the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and had its designs/products approved by Admiral Gial Ackbar.
